summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Gruha Homes architectural website. All backend APIs and frontend features are fully functional.
passed_tests: Logo intro animation loads and transitions properly (5 second wait)
Theme toggle works with dark/light mode and localStorage persistence
Navbar navigation with all links, logo, Get a Quote CTA functional
Hero section with parallax background, animated stats counters (500+ homes, 15+ years, 98% satisfaction, 50Cr+ value)
Hero CTAs (Explore Projects, Watch Showreel) navigate correctly
Projects masonry grid with category filtering (All: 6, Villas: 2, Apartments: 2, Commercial: 1, Interior: 1)
Videos section with 3 video cards and working modal functionality
Contact form fully integrated with backend API (POST /api/contact)
Newsletter subscription integrated with backend API (POST /api/newsletter)
All API endpoints working: Root, Contact CRUD, Newsletter CRUD, proper error handling
Google Maps integration in contact section
All 13 backend API tests passed (100% success rate)
Contact form validation and success/error messaging
Pricing section with 3 plan cards (Essential, Premium, Luxury) and CTAs
